context: Turkey: The torch relay leg in <a4_0>Istanbul<a4_0/>, held on <a0_0>April 3<a0_0/>, started on <a2_0><a5_0>Sultanahmet Square<a5_0/><a2_0/> and finished in <a1_0><a6_0>Taksim Square<a1_0/>.<a6_0/> <a3_0><a7_0>Uyghurs<a7_0/> living in Turkey<a3_0/> protested at Chinese treatment of their compatriots living in Xinjiang. Several protesters who tried to disrupt the relay were promptly <a8_0>arrested<a8_0/> by the police.
